content: oh day 2 / 24 christmas tree abbreviations chain - chain flo - front loop only difficulty mc - magic_ring blo - back loop only time 1 h slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet material yarnart jeans increase - increase decrease - decrease hook 2 mm written pattern note as the christmas tree is worked as base a continuous spiral - a removable stitch marker to mark the beginning of the round 0 mc round is recommended and rounds are round 1 single_crochet 6 6 total not finished with slip_stitch round 2 increase 6 12 total round 3 increase single_crochet x 6 18 total round 4 increase single_crochet 2 x 6 24 total round 5 single_crochet 24 blo 24 total cone - decreasing note remember to stuff the cone before it becomes too narrow continue working single_crochet in blo decrease blo every 10th stitch until 12 stitches are left then decrease blo each 6th until 8 stitches are left do not cut the yarn turn note additionally you can sew the top blos before starting the branches cone - branches continue with the same yarn as the previous part *chain 3 slip_stitch flo in the next stitch repeat from * until the end of flo cut the yarn and weave the ends in hanger make the hanger from the ribbon or the yarn of your choice and attach it at the top of the christmas tree congratulations you finished the second ornament be sure to add the result in the dedicated thread in the event 22 to go
